# GET /v1/scmProviders/{id}/relationships/repositories | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/scmProviders/{id}/relationships/repositories ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-scmProviders-_id_-relationships-repositories)

-  GET /v1/scmProviders/{id}/relationships/repositories 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/scmProviders/{id}/relationships/repositories

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-scmProviders-_id_-relationships-repositories#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/scmProviders/{id}/relationships/repositories
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-scmProviders-_id_-relationships-repositories#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-scmProviders-_id_-relationships-repositories#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-scmProviders-_id_-relationships-repositories#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[ScmProviderRepositoriesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/scmproviderrepositorieslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-scmProviders-_id_-relationships-repositories#see-also)

### [Getting Provider Information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-scmProviders-_id_-relationships-repositories#Getting-Provider-Information)

[`List All Source Code Management Providers`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmproviders)List all source code management providers you connected to Xcode Cloud.[`Get a Source Code Management Provider`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmproviders-_id_)Get information about a specific source code management provider you connected to Xcode Cloud.[`List all Repositories for a Source Code Management Provider`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-scmproviders-_id_-repositories)List all Git repositories for a specific source code management provider you connected to Xcode Cloud.
